item.title: Bhai Dooj
item.description:
Bhai Dooj: A Celebration of Sibling Love That Shines Brighter Than Diwali

Imagine a festival bathed in the golden glow of autumn, filled with laughter, delicious aromas, and a tangible feeling of warmth. Thatâ€™s Bhai Dooj, a beautiful Indian celebration that takes place right after Diwali, focusing on the cherished bond between brothers and sisters. While Diwali is the festival of lights, Bhai Dooj is the festival of sibling love, a day dedicated to strengthening ties and showering blessings upon each other. Forget presents and superficial gestures; Bhai Dooj is about genuine affection, protection, and a promise to always be there for each other, through thick and thin.
